# First Publication-Ready Figure

```{r}
pacman::p_load(datasauRus)
```
We see that 
```{r}
datasaurus_dozen |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, colour = dataset)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(vars(dataset)) +
  labs(color = "Dataset")
```
